                    <span class="ani_border"></span>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B9%A0%E8%BF%91%E5%B9%B3%E5%90%8C%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E9%80%9A%E7%94%B5%E8%AF%9D%23&amp;from=default">#习近平同特朗普通电话#</a>：中国政府高度重视在美中国公民的生命安全和身体健康】27日，国家主席习近平应约同美国总统特朗普通电话。习近平强调，新冠肺炎疫情发生以来，中方始终本着公开、透明、负责任态度，及时向世卫组织以及包括美国在内的有关国家通报疫情信息，毫无保留地同各方分享防控和治疗经 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAxnvsKlc" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487081176851322:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487081176851322&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4487078198548830" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAxiHzRWm?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 13:17" date="1585286271000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4487078198548830:fromprofile"> 3月27日 13:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9F%B3%E5%8F%B6%E5%88%80%E5%AD%90%E5%88%8A%E7%A7%B0%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%B0%81%E9%97%AD%E6%8E%AA%E6%96%BD%E5%BB%B6%E7%BC%93%E4%BA%86%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#柳叶刀子刊称武汉封闭措施延缓了疫情暴发#</a>】26日，《柳叶刀》子刊《柳叶刀·公共卫生》发表的一篇研究报告显示：新冠肺炎疫情发生后，中国武汉采取的严格封闭措施延缓了疫情暴发，为卫生系统应对重症病例争取到了“关键时间”。研究人员建模分析发现，“关闭学校和企业”等措施起到了至关重要的作用 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAxiHzRWm" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487078198548830:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487078198548830&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609351231&amp;ssig=aNtyQuPn%2BX" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4487070745536041" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAx6GneaZ?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 12:48" date="1585284493000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4487070745536041:fromprofile"> 3月27日 12:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8C%E4%B9%A1%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#我的同乡英雄#</a>【正直播！安徽第三批医疗队300名医护人员返程回乡<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】安徽第三批支援湖北医疗队300名医护人员已抵达武汉天河机场，即将登上回家的航班。他们回家最想做些什么？临行前想对武汉点儿啥？看直播↓<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B0%A2%E8%B0%A2%E4%BD%A0%E4%B8%BA%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%8B%BC%E8%BF%87%E5%91%BD%23&amp;from=default">#谢谢你为湖北拼过命#</a>！（总台央视记者李璟慧 谢琳） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4487070745536041:1034-video:1034%3A4487077971296286:page_100206_home:2656274875:4487070745536041:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZyYNSW" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZyYNSW" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【世卫组织总干事：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%A4%A7%E6%B5%81%E8%A1%8C%E7%8E%B0%E6%AD%A3%E4%BB%A5%E6%8C%87%E6%95%B0%E7%BA%A7%E9%80%9F%E5%BA%A6%E5%A2%9E%E9%95%BF%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎大流行现正以指数级速度增长#</a>】世卫组织总干事谭德塞在二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会表示，全球已有近50万人感染新冠肺炎，超2万人丧生，新冠肺炎大流行正以指数级速度增长。他提出三点应对疫情的要求：①战斗，培养、增加卫生工作者；②团结，全球共同应对；③激 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAwNf64qj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487058691446975:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487058691446975&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4487051301178577" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAwBk4WBj?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 11:30" date="1585279858000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4487051301178577:fromprofile"> 3月27日 11:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【张文宏：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD2%E4%B8%AA%E6%9C%88%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%BB%8F%E9%AA%8C%E5%AF%B9%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%98%AF%E6%9C%89%E5%B8%AE%E5%8A%A9%E7%9A%84%23&amp;from=default">#中国2个月抗疫经验对美国是有帮助的#</a>】张文宏教授表示，中国和新冠肺炎斗争两个多月时间的经验，对美国是有帮助的。约80%的人患新冠肺炎后，可以自己熬过去；约20%的人需要氧疗，必须要去医院。所以，大多数情况下，美国医院不会接受病人住院。从美国的医疗体制、对疫情的预估来讲，他们非 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAwBk4WBj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487051301178577:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487051301178577&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23G20%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E4%B8%BE%E5%8A%9E%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#G20首次举办领导人视频峰会#</a>】昨晚，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>举行，这是G20首次举行领导人视频峰会。在疫情全球蔓延的危急时刻，G20成员国领导人和世界卫生组织、联合国等国际组织负责人跨越不同时区，就应对疫情蔓延、稳定世界经济进行沟通协调↓ ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IAwsapSxx&amp;mid=4487045626167855&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen&amp;pid=9e5389bbly1gd8b5rjpscj20oy0f0wj0" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>2641</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4487040630401643" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAwk71Gu7?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 10:48" date="1585277314000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4487040630401643:fromprofile"> 3月27日 10:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%9C%B0%E9%93%81%E4%B8%BA%E6%81%A2%E5%A4%8D%E8%BF%90%E8%90%A5%E5%81%9A%E5%87%86%E5%A4%87%23&amp;from=default">#武汉地铁为恢复运营做准备#</a>】今天，武汉市地铁站6号线大智路车站正在进行消杀，为明天的地铁恢复运行做准备。关注直播↓看武汉地铁站里忙碌的场景！（总台央视记者徐之昊&nbsp;&nbsp;王伟超） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4487040630401643:1034-video:1034%3A4487045746196485:page_100206_home:2656274875:4487040630401643:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Zy2QH6" alt="http://t.cn/A6Zy2QH6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%AF%A6%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#浙江境外输入关联病例详情#</a>】3月26日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#浙江新增1例境外输入关联病例#</a>：病例为男性，25岁。3月21日从北京乘航班CA1716到萧山机场，由其母亲驾车接回位于海宁市斜桥镇的海宁东泰制衣有限公司（为独栋厂房）。22日中午自驾回温州扫墓，25日16时返回海宁，当晚因发热、头痛、咳嗽至定点医院发热门诊就 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAwi8nXaV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487039405709017:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487039405709017&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【划重点！习近平在<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>的发言】在中方最困难的时候，国际社会许多成员给予中方真诚的帮助和支持，我们会始终铭记并珍视这份友谊；当前，国际社会最需要的是坚定信心、团结应对；只要我们同舟共济、守望互助，就一定能彻底战胜疫情，迎来人类发展更加美好的明天…转 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAw5xplEC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487031596041442:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487031596041442&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E8%AF%B4%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%9B%9E%E5%9B%BD%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E7%9A%84%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%E6%9D%A5%E8%87%AA%E7%99%BB%E6%9C%BA%E5%89%8D%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏说留学生回国最大的风险来自登机前#</a>】机舱是高风险区域。有人可能途中会摘掉口罩，假如有感染者，十几个小时下来，封闭的机舱里存在病毒传播的风险。所以乘机途中，必须保证长时间佩戴口罩。但是，最大的风险还是来自登机前，很多人登机前就已感染，落地后就被检测出来了，只有少部分人在隔离 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAvSpAucR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487023458695925:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487023458695925&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#浙江新增1例境外输入关联病例#</a>】3月26日0-24时，浙江新增境外输入关联本地确诊病例1例（嘉兴市1例）；新增境外输入新冠肺炎确诊病例3例（法国输入1例、西班牙输入1例、巴西输入1例）。无新增出院病例。截至3月26日24时，浙江累计报告境外输入确诊病例29例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%BF%9E%E7%BA%BF%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E5%9B%A2%E9%98%9F%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山连线美国专家团队#</a>】今天上午，在广州医科大学附属第一医院，钟南山院士与美国方面的专家进行视频连线，就新冠肺炎疫情的抗疫经验和诊疗情况进行合作研讨。关注！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4487006581489676:1034-video:1034%3A4487041040187411:page_100206_home:2656274875:4487006581489676:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZLCTKt" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZLCTKt" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4487004668167180" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAvo6ygEI?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 08:25" date="1585268740000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4487004668167180:fromprofile"> 3月27日 08:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2313%E5%9C%B0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B54%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#13地新增境外输入病例54例#</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;警惕！严防！】3月26日0—24时，新增报告境外输入确诊病例54例（上海17例，广东12例，北京4例，天津4例，内蒙古3例，浙江3例，福建3例，山东2例，云南2例，辽宁1例，江苏1例，四川1例，陕西1例）。截至3月26日24时，累计报告境外输入确诊病例595例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E55%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增55例新冠肺炎#</a> 其中1例为本土病例】3月26日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例55例，其中境外输入病例54例，本土病例1例（浙江1例）；新增死亡病例5例（湖北5例）；新增疑似病例49例。 当日新增治愈出院病例537例，解除医学观察的密切接触者837人， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAvnJg1qf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487004433818719:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487004433818719&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4487003309944498" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAvlUFJ18?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 08:20" date="1585268416000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4487003309944498:fromprofile"> 3月27日 08:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%89%B9%E6%95%88%E8%8D%AF%E8%BF%98%E6%9C%89%E5%A4%9A%E8%BF%9C%23&amp;from=default">#新冠特效药还有多远#</a>？】中国科学院院士周琪：针对新冠肺炎，目前还没有真正意义上的特效药，找到特效药是研发工作的重中之重。这是一个不短的过程，但针对冠状病毒的研究已持续多年了，很多工作应该在不远的将来能取得成功。在抗疫过程中，所有的手段都是必要的，都是应该储备的，疫苗是一个重要手 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAvlUFJ18" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4487003309944498:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4487003309944498&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4487003309944498"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>1948</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4487003309944498&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">

        </div>
    </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3248036930" usercard="id=3248036930">zu海洋</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a class="icon_icon" title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://car.weibo.com/pc/view?page=123456"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans6"></i></a>：基辛格在《论中国》里说过一句话：中国总是被他们最勇敢的人保护着。湖北人真英雄！医务人员第一时间上前线与疾病搏斗，不计报酬，不论生死，快递员、社区人员所有人带着一份必胜的信念，点燃自己，照亮阴霾。        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486997647256224" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAvcMurFS?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 07:57" date="1585267066000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486997647256224:fromprofile"> 3月27日 07:57</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【到底<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E4%BC%9A%E6%9C%89%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#为什么会有无症状感染者#</a>？】中国科学院院士周琪：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E5%BE%88%E7%8B%A1%E7%8C%BE%23&amp;from=default">#新冠病毒很狡猾#</a>，在进化中伪装自己并传播出去。出现部分无症状感染者，或是尚未发现更有效的检验手段和检测试剂，或是未发现更值得关注的重要症状和临床检测标记。未来的防控过程中，如何更早预防、预警、检测，且有明确防范手段，是主攻方向 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAvcMurFS" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486997647256224:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486997647256224&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4486997823861283&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=6406694930&amp;commentmid=4486997647256224" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>49</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">3月27日 07:58</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->

        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">

        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486989170202374" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAuZ70QE6?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 07:24" date="1585265045000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486989170202374:fromprofile"> 3月27日 07:24</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E5%BC%BA%E8%B0%83%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%BF%85%E9%A1%BB%E5%B0%BD%E5%BF%AB%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普强调美国人必须尽快复工#</a>】美国总统特朗普26日在白宫发布会上强调，美国人民“必须重返工作岗位”。同时，他指出，人们仍应采取隔离等有效防护措施。特朗普说，某些受疫情影响较小的地区或可率先开始复工，“我们必须尽快开始这个过程。”特朗普表示下周将透露相关计划。24日，他在接受采访时 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAuZ70QE6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486989170202374:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486989170202374&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IAuTX2Qkc&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609351241&amp;ssig=HZ6PYQm9AO" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486985970677796" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAuTX2Qkc?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 07:11" date="1585264282000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486985970677796:fromprofile"> 3月27日 07:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%BF%91%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球单日新增确诊病例近五万例#</a>】根据世卫组织发布的数据，截至欧洲中部时间3月26日10时（北京时间3月26日17时），全球新冠肺炎新增49219例，死亡新增2401例。疫情最为严重的欧洲区域已确诊250287例（新增29771例），死亡13950例（新增1964例）。（总台记者朱赫） ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">3月27日 07:12</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%88%90%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%95%B0%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%9A%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%23&amp;from=default">#美国成全球新冠肺炎确诊数最多国家#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%B6%858%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国累计确诊新冠肺炎超8万例#</a>】据约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据，截至美东时间26日17：37，美国新冠确诊病例为82404例，死亡1178例。从3月23日开始，美国日新增病例均超过1万。美国总统特朗普26日在发布会上表示，确诊人数的上升是由于检测效率的提高。（央视记者王 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAuQX8KUQ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486984112086972:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486984112086972&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4486880344861785" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAs9AkoLT?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-27 00:11" date="1585239099000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486880344861785:fromprofile"> 3月27日 00:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BB%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%B4%E8%81%94%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#主播说联播#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%E6%B0%B4%E5%B9%B3%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E9%98%9F%E7%95%99%E5%9C%A8%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%98%AF%E5%AE%9A%E5%BF%83%E4%B8%B8%23&amp;from=default">#最高水平国家队留在武汉是定心丸#</a>】中央已经明确，要在武汉保留高水平重症救治力量，降低病亡率。越到最后，救治难度会越大，把最高水平的国家队留下来，战斗到最后，直到最后一名患者救治结束，这既是责任担当、慎终如始，也是给还没有出院的患者一个定心丸、一份信心。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAs9AkoLT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486880344861785:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486880344861785&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【如何做好预防？<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BC%A0%E6%96%87%E5%AE%8F%E8%AF%B4%E4%B8%8D%E5%A4%96%E5%87%BA%E9%97%B2%E9%80%9B%E6%AF%94%E5%9B%A4%E8%8D%AF%E5%BC%BA%23&amp;from=default">#张文宏说不外出闲逛比囤药强#</a>】张文宏表示，不建议自己去囤积大量的羟基氯喹或氯喹。药不是用来预防新冠肺炎的，最好的预防，还是多喝水、多喝牛奶、多吃鸡蛋、多睡觉、不外出闲逛。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4486877694436514:1034-video:1034%3A4486877617520671:page_100206_home:2656274875:4486877694436514:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z2RVKg" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z2RVKg" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486876939364879" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAs45Dier?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 23:58" date="1585238287000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486876939364879:fromprofile"> 3月26日 23:58</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E5%B0%86%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A85%E4%B8%87%E4%BA%BF%E7%BE%8E%E5%85%83%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E8%AE%A1%E5%88%92%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团将启动5万亿美元经济计划#</a>】沙特国家电视台消息显示，二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会当地时间26日下午正式闭幕。二十国集团将启动总价值5万亿美元的经济计划，以应对疫情对全球社会、经济和金融带来的负面影响，并支持各国中央银行采取措施促进金融稳定和增强全球市场的流动性。（ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAs45Dier" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486876939364879:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486876939364879&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609351241&amp;ssig=HZ6PYQm9AO" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486874485865720" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAs08oBWo?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 23:48" date="1585237702000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486874485865720:fromprofile"> 3月26日 23:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%BD%95%E6%97%B6%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E6%8B%90%E7%82%B9%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎疫情何时出现拐点#</a>？张文宏：没到高峰，就谈不上拐点】张文宏教授表示，事实上美国已失去了一个非常好的早期防疫防控阶段。疫情拐点什么时候可以见到？取决于美国最近采取的紧急事件响应，如果政策执行不到位，拐点还看不见；如果执行到位，原则上10-14天左右，可看到新增病例数的降低 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAs08oBWo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486874485865720:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486874485865720&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IAs08oBWo&amp;mid=4486874485865720&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>944</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

        <div class="WB_feed_detail clearfix" node-type="feed_content">

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609351248&amp;ssig=zvPd0t7zVS" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486867514421371" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IArOTiycr?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 23:20" date="1585236040000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486867514421371:fromprofile"> 3月26日 23:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【28日起<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%9A%82%E5%81%9C%E5%A4%96%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E6%8C%81%E6%9C%89%E6%95%88%E7%AD%BE%E8%AF%81%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%23&amp;from=default">#中国暂停外国人持有效签证入境#</a>】外交部、国家移民管理局今天发布公告：自28日0时起，暂时停止外国人持目前有效来华签证和居留许可入境。暂停外国人持APEC商务旅行卡入境。暂停口岸签证、24/72/144小时过境免签等政策。持外交、公务、礼遇、C字签证入境不受影响。外国人如来华从事必要的经贸 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IArOTiycr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486867514421371:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486867514421371&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486864746776341" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IArKqsqPP?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 23:09" date="1585235380000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486864746776341:fromprofile"> 3月26日 23:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E8%B6%856%E5%8D%83%E5%8C%BB%E5%8A%A1%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#意大利超6千医务人员感染新冠肺炎#</a>】据意大利安莎社26日报道，意大利高等卫生研究院最新统计数据显示，意大利已有6205名医务人员感染新冠病毒，约占全国总确诊病例的9%；因新冠肺炎死亡的医生达37人。（总台记者殷欣） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0%23&amp;from=default">#武汉日记#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%8F%E9%86%92%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%E6%A0%B7%23&amp;from=default">#苏醒中的武汉什么样#</a>】烟火气升，城市渐醒。就在这几天，被按下暂停键的武汉已经陆续重启、恢复城市的各项功能。现在的武汉是什么样？戳视频，跟<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%88%AA%E6%8B%8D%E5%A4%A9%E5%A4%9A%E9%AB%98?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=航拍天多高">@航拍天多高</a> 一起去武汉的街头走一走，感受正在苏醒的武汉。转！武汉加油！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4486855510201854:1034-video:1034%3A4486855228325951:page_100206_home:2656274875:4486855510201854:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z2XuGS" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z2XuGS" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486848150104771" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IArjF0rfR?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 22:03" date="1585231423000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486848150104771:fromprofile"> 3月26日 22:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【张文宏：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%B9%B4%E8%BD%BB%E4%BA%BA%E7%9E%8E%E6%B7%B7%E5%B0%B1%E6%98%AF%E6%9C%80%E5%A4%A7%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%23&amp;from=default">#美国年轻人瞎混就是最大感染风险#</a>】为什么美国年轻人感染那么多？张文宏表示，首先，像中国疾控人员一样，对病例不遗余力的追踪这一点，美国还做不到；其次，瞎混就是最大的风险，美国、英国很多人不戴口罩，一到晚上酒吧里密密麻麻，拿着一杯酒就可以聊一晚上，病毒播散风险性极大。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IArjF0rfR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486848150104771:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486848150104771&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4486842109412416" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAr9UDuBa?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 21:39" date="1585229983000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486842109412416:fromprofile"> 3月26日 21:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4486839282851665" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAr5mbXQB?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 21:28" date="1585229309000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486839282851665:fromprofile"> 3月26日 21:28</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%85%A8%E8%A6%86%E7%9B%96%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%23&amp;from=default">#入境广东人员全覆盖核酸检测#</a> 全自费集中隔离】据广东省疫情防控指挥部办公室，明天6:00起，对所有经广东口岸入境人员（含港澳台地区，含中转旅客）实行核酸检测全覆盖，并集中隔离医学观察14天，集中隔离食宿费用自理。（总台央视记者魏星） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=6136604466&amp;screen_name=YourDrops" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                    <li>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">3月26日 21:29</div>

                                <a name="4486834128165221" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IAqX2yg97?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-26 21:08" date="1585228080000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4486834128165221:fromprofile"> 3月26日 21:08</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>【习近平：加强国际宏观经济政策协调 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%98%B2%E6%AD%A2%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E9%99%B7%E5%85%A5%E8%A1%B0%E9%80%80%23&amp;from=default">#防止世界经济陷入衰退#</a>】习近平强调，疫情对全球生产和需求造成全面冲击，各国应该联手加大宏观政策对冲力度，防止世界经济陷入衰退。要实施有力有效的财政和货币政策，加强金融监管协调，共同维护全球产业链供应链稳定。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqX2yg97" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486834128165221:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486834128165221&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>【习近平：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%B0%86%E4%B8%BA%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E7%A8%B3%E5%AE%9A%E4%BD%9C%E5%87%BA%E8%B4%A1%E7%8C%AE%23&amp;from=default">#中国将为世界经济稳定作出贡献#</a>】习近平指出，中国将加大力度向国际市场供应原料药、生活必需品、防疫物资等产品。继续实施积极的财政政策和稳健的货币政策，坚定不移扩大改革开放，放宽市场准入，持续优化营商环境，积极扩大进口，扩大对外投资，为 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqWasDgC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486833586824130:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486833586824130&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    </ul>
                </div>

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%8C%E5%8D%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E9%A2%86%E5%AF%BC%E4%BA%BA%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%89%B9%E5%88%AB%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#二十国集团领导人应对新冠肺炎特别峰会#</a>【习近平：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%B9%E7%A7%AF%E6%9E%81%E6%94%AF%E6%8C%81%E5%9B%BD%E9%99%85%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%8F%91%E6%8C%A5%E4%BD%9C%E7%94%A8%23&amp;from=default">#中方积极支持国际组织发挥作用#</a>】习近平强调，中方支持世界卫生组织发挥领导作用，制定科学合理防控措施，尽力阻止疫情跨境传播。二十国集团应加强疫情防控信息共享，推广全面系统有效的防控指南，适时举办全球公共卫生安全高级别会议。中国将同各国 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IAqVmwhNv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4486833087694913:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4486833087694913&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            </div>
        </div>

                                               【世卫组织总干事：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"                                                                                   【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%B5%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%85%B3%E8%81%94%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#浙江新增1例境外输入关联病例#<\/a>】3月26日0-24时，浙江新增境外输入关联本地确诊病例1例（嘉兴市1例）；新增境外输入新冠肺炎确诊病例3例（法国输入1例、西班牙输入1例、巴西输入1例）。无新增出院病例。截至3月26日24时，浙江累计报告境外输入确诊病例29例。
